solution_line_template: There are {carrots_calories_per_pound} / {broccoli_calorie_divisor} = <<{carrots_calories_per_pound}/{broccoli_calorie_divisor}={broccoli_calories_per_pound}>>{broccoli_calories_per_pound} calories in each pound of broccoli
So he ate {broccoli_pounds} * {broccoli_calories_per_pound} = <<{broccoli_pounds}*{broccoli_calories_per_pound}={total_broccoli_calories}>>{total_broccoli_calories} calories of broccoli
So in total he ate {total_carrots_calories} + {total_broccoli_calories} = <<{total_carrots_calories}+{total_broccoli_calories}={total_calories_eaten}>>{total_calories_eaten} calories
